concept.title: Door locks
concept.shortdesc: The door locks let you lock the doors with a key to prevent others accessing your car.

copyright.copyrholder: This documentation project is free to redistribute and modify under the terms of the GNU General Public License Version 3. See the GNU General Public License or licence.txt for more details.

conbody.p: The driver's door is locked from the outside using the ignition key.
The passenger's door can be locked from the inside by lifting up the small safety catch on the front of the door lock.

fig.title: Safety catch on the inside passenger door
